jspecview.util
Class JDXCompressor

java.lang.Object
  jspecview.util.JDXCompressor

public class JDXCompressor
extends java.lang.Object

JDXCompressor takes an array of Coordinates and compresses them into one of the JCAMP-DX compression formats: DIF, FIX, PAC and SQZ.

Author:
Christopher Muir, Debbie-Ann Facey, Khari A. Bryan, Prof Robert J. Lancashire
See Also:
Coordinate, JDXDecompressor

Method Detail

compressDIF

public static java.lang.String compressDIF(Coordinate[] xyCoords,
                                           int startDataPointIndex,
                                           int endDataPointIndex,
                                           double xFactor,
                                           double yFactor)
Compresses the Coordinates into DIF format

Parameters:
xyCoords - the array of Coordinates
startDataPointIndex - the start index of the array of Coordinates to be compressed
endDataPointIndex - the end index of the array of Coordinates to be compressed
xFactor - x factor for compression
yFactor - y factor for compression
Returns:
A String representing the compressed data
